author: drkovalskyi
body:
Keep output of all hltScoutingMuonPacker* modules

#### PR description:

Scouting is using to types of muons: with and without vertex constraint, which are created by difference muon reconstruction sequences. We need to be able to keep collections containing both versions. The simplest solution is to keep all products of modules that match the following pattern: hltScoutingMuonPacker*. It less restrictive then the current configuration and doesn't force us to pick the names right now, i.e. it's a more flexible solution.
title: Update HLTrigger_EventContent_cff.py
